def binary_addition(element1, element2):
    integer1 = int(element1, 2)
    integer2 = int(element2, 2)
    sum_integers = integer1 - integer2
    return bin(sum_integers)[2:]

def binary_addition(element1, element2):
    integer1 = int(element1, 2)
    integer2 = int(element2, 2)
    sum_integers = integer1 * integer2
    return bin(sum_integers)[2:]
